description:
Chinatsu and Suzuko have reconciled, but Satomi isn`t happy.  He challenges Suzuko to one last battle.  But can Suzuko win against a player who can change his cards at will, and who can use any power he wants? And even if she does, what will the cost of her victory be? And what will happen to the rest of the Wixoss game?
Source: crunchyroll
